snippet.title: Can This Game Make You a Better Shooter?
snippet.description:
Get ACE - https://www.ACEXR.com

0:00 - Intro
1:00 - Overview and Disclaimer
2:30 - Hardware and Setup
6:45 - Range Hut, Game Settings, and Customization Features
8:12 - Skills Overview
10:07 - Mini-game (Thrills) overview
10:59 - Mixed Reality
11:52 - Drills Overview
12:41 - Leaderboards
13:30 - Series (Match-style drills)
14:12 - Does ACE Actually Work?
17:30 - Moving and Shooting
18:35 - Shortcomings

Connect
IRL Channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzJipC-ZyOQKsdeyd7bvang
Games - https://www.nexus.gg/controlledpairsgaming
Merch -  https://controlled-pairs-apparel.creator-spring.com
Discord - https://discord.gg/JShRCGrccj
Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/controlledpairs
Subreddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/ControlledPairsGaming/
Instagram - http://www.instagram.com/controlled.pairs/
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/controlledpairsgaming
controlledpairsgaming@gmail.com

My Gear (Affiliate Links)
Gamer PCs - https://www.metapcs.com (code 'Pairs' to save)
HOTAS and Flight Stick - https://amzn.to/3vqAIU2
VR Headset - https://amzn.to/3U1QlMd
My VR Rifle Stock - https://www.protubevr.com/en/vr-accessories/169-6174-magtube-gunstock.html?affp=15187#/mtb_1_tube-chrome_tubes/mtb_2_color-silver_grey_cups/mtb_0_brand-meta_quest_3_pro
My VR Rifle Stock (With Haptics) - https://www.protubevr.com/en/vr-accessories/168-6158-forcetube-haptic-gunstock.html?affp=15187#/color-grey/buttstock-haptic_explorer_5_joules_max/tube-chrome_tubes/brand-meta_quest_3_and_quest_pro

Recommended Reading (Affiliate) 
Small Unit Tactics: https://amzn.to/40iA8T3
Small Unit Raids: https://amzn.to/40js0lg
